items.content_html: EasyFileShare is a lightweight Python web application hosted on Google Compute Engine that simplifies remote file sharing without the need for user accounts. Leveraging the flexibility and simplicity of Flask, EasyFileShare provides a seamless and secure file-sharing experience.
items.title: devfemibadmus/easyfileshare: EasyFileShare is a lightweight Python web application hosted on Google Compute Engine that simplifies remote file sharing without the need for user accounts. Leveraging the flexibility and simplicity of Flask, EasyFileShare provides a seamless and secure file-sharing experience.
